mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum rnum, B.* FROM ( SELECT c.pfm_idx pfmIdx,c.name, p.origin_name originName ,p.stored_name storedName FROM performance c, poster_info p WHERE c.genre_idx=#{genreIdx} AND p.pfm_idx=c.pfm_idx ORDER BY pfmidx desc )B ORDER BY rnum) WHERE rnum between #{paging.startNo } AND #{paging.endNo }
SELECT count(*) FROM performance c, poster_info p WHERE c.genre_idx=#{genreIdx} AND p.pfm_idx=c.pfm_idx

SELECT c.pfm_idx pfmIdx,f.name name, p.origin_name originName ,p.stored_name storedName, f.pfm_start pfmStart, f.pfm_end pfmEnd, h.hall_name hallName FROM category_con c ,poster_info p, performance f, hall h WHERE p.pfm_idx=c.pfm_idx AND p.pfm_idx=f.pfm_idx AND f.hall_idx=h.hall_idx

SELECT c.pfm_idx pfmIdx,f.name name, p.origin_name originName ,p.stored_name storedName, f.pfm_start pfmStart, f.pfm_end pfmEnd, h.hall_name hallName FROM category_mu c,poster_info p,performance f, hall h WHERE p.pfm_idx=c.pfm_idx AND p.pfm_idx=f.pfm_idx AND f.hall_idx=h.hall_idx

SELECT c.pfm_idx pfmIdx,f.name name, p.origin_name originName ,p.stored_name storedName, f.pfm_start pfmStart, f.pfm_end pfmEnd, h.hall_name hallName FROM category_fam c ,poster_info p, performance f, hall h WHERE p.pfm_idx=c.pfm_idx AND p.pfm_idx=f.pfm_idx AND f.hall_idx=h.hall_idx

SELECT c.pfm_idx pfmIdx,c.name, p.origin_name originName ,p.stored_name storedName FROM performance c, poster_info p WHERE c.genre_idx=1 AND p.pfm_idx=c.pfm_idx
AND c.name LIKE '%${value }%'
